tables.name: User

columns.name: userId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE User ADD COLUMN userId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: username
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE User ADD COLUMN username STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: data
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE User ADD COLUMN data BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE User (userId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, username STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, data BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL) PRIMARY KEY (userId ASC)

indexes.name: UniqueUsername
indexes.createIndexDdl: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX UniqueUsername ON User(username)

tables.name: Account

columns.name: accountId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN accountId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: userId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN userId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: accountType
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN accountType FLOAT64 NOT NULL

columns.name: lastAccessedTimeMs
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN lastAccessedTimeMs FLOAT64 NOT NULL

columns.name: createdTimeMs
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN createdTimeMs FLOAT64 NOT NULL

columns.name: data
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN data BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE Account (accountId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, userId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, accountType FLOAT64 NOT NULL, lastAccessedTimeMs FLOAT64 NOT NULL, createdTimeMs FLOAT64 NOT NULL, data BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL) PRIMARY KEY (accountId ASC)

indexes.name: ByUserAndLastAccessTimeMs
indexes.createIndexDdl: CREATE INDEX ByUserAndLastAccessTimeMs ON Account(userId, lastAccessedTimeMs DESC)

indexes.name: ByTypeAndCreatedTimeMs
indexes.createIndexDdl: CREATE INDEX ByTypeAndCreatedTimeMs ON Account(accountType, createdTimeMs DESC)

tables.name: AccountMore

columns.name: accountId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE AccountMore ADD COLUMN accountId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: data
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE AccountMore ADD COLUMN data BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE AccountMore (accountId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, data BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL) PRIMARY KEY (accountId ASC)

tables.name: VideoPlayerSettings

columns.name: accountId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE VideoPlayerSettings ADD COLUMN accountId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: settings
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE VideoPlayerSettings ADD COLUMN settings BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE VideoPlayerSettings (accountId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, settings BYTES(MAX) NOT NULL) PRIMARY KEY (accountId ASC)
